title: Typo in error message from missing / wrong _version_ field
description:
Note the missing space between version and field.

Caused by: org.apache.solr.common.SolrException: Unable to use updateLog: version_field must exist in schema, using indexed="true" stored="true" and multiValued="false" (_version is not indexed

SOLR-5259: Fix typo in error message when version field is missing
